Posts.Content: It is definitely from the Neulasta!  That shot put my husband in the hospital with extreme pain and a heart rate of 170!  This was all after the first round of chemo and we refused the second shot of Neulasta.  We are raising his cell count by eating the right foods.  Check the internet for foods that raise blood cell count and stay away from Neulasta!
